patterns: how far is hostel from college
responses: Manav Rachna provides safe and affordable hostel facilities for boys and girls. Manav Rachna provides both On campus and Off campus hostel accommodation for boys and girls ( both AC & Non AC ).Our state-of-the-art infrastructure gives every student the feeling of a ‘home away from home’ offering modern, safe and comfortable residence.The Hostel has a dedicated power back-up through generators along with 24 hrs internet connectivity in the rooms through WI-FI. It also boasts of a well-managed & hygienic mess where nutritional needs and taste of students are taken care of with RO drinking water. For more details visit here

We have well-equipped libraries, Wi-Fi services, smart classes, and parking facilities. There is no compromise with the quality of food served in the mess and canteen. Doctors are available 24X7. Every sport is equally treated and games like shooting, football, cricket, etc., are available. For campus tour please visit the following link. here

The overall infrastructure of our college is really good. We have access to all the basic facilities, including Wi-Fi and a library. Classrooms and labs are air-conditioned, and the library is also air-conditioned. Hostel rooms are spacious, and the mess provides good quality food. Medical facilities are available for all the students. For infrastructure details visit here

To know more about documents required visit here

patterns: Is there a cafetaria in college
responses: Eating Joints are the common hangouts for students in educational institutions. Manav Rachna campus has a number of Cafeterias and Canteens catering to the varied taste of students. These hangout corners provide delectable food in a hygienic environment. The excellent multi-cuisine menus range from Indian to Continental and Chinese in a comfortable and vibrant ambience. One can find enormous range of Indian, Chinese, and Continental food and beverages at the outlets. here

Manav Rachna Education Institutions have a fleet of luxury A/C buses to provide transport to the students for Delhi-NCR covering various locations of Delhi, Noida, Ghaziabad, Gurgaon, Faridabad, Ballabhgarh and Palwal students. MREI buses are equipped with all safety devices like Fire Extinguisher, First-aid Kit etc. These are also equipped with GPS to track the bus location, route, speed etc. and speed governor to restrict the speed of the buses.here

patterns: please provide sports and games information
responses: Manav Rachna encourages all-round development of students and hence provides sports facilities in the campus.World class sports facilities for outdoor and indoor games (which include basketball, volley ball, cricket, shooting, table tennis, squash, billiards, soccer, chess, carom to name a few) offers infrastructure which caters for budding sports learners. There is a 25m Shooting Range and 10m air conditioned Indoor Shooting Range operated on SIUS Ascor electronics targets of Olympics standards. Manav Rachna also has an indoor badminton and table tennis stadia with synthetic courts in association with Yonex and Stag respectively. These offer the best facilities in Haryana. A Sports Fitness Centre to meet psychological, physiotherapy and other health related issues is also available. Besides, Manav Rachna boasts of a Soccer Academy and a Semi Olympic sized swimming pool. For more details visithere
